name: Digital Logic Sim 2
description:
This isn't my game BUT...

The project was abandoned and I found it open-source on GitHub and want to update it.

You can also join to continue updating this game. https://github.com/UkrainianBanderasCat/Digital-Logic-Sim2

You can easily download it, update and fork it.

The original project is https://sebastian.itch.io/digital-logic-sim
